conversion_verification.notes: Render is an angled cutaway with extruded walls (height + thickness), visible floor plane, and exposed interior volumes.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion, correct elevated/isometric-like view, clean cutaway, and readable multi-face wall geometry.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room layout and adjacencies match well (living/dining central, kitchen bottom, utility bottom-left, toilets in expected zones, decks present). Some minor proportion/label inconsistencies and openings (windows/doors) are not fully verifiable or appear simplified.

interior_elements.notes: Beds, sofa/seating, dining table, kitchen counters, and basic bathroom fixtures are present and generally placed in the correct rooms with reasonable scale/orientation.

visual_clarity.notes: Geometry is clear and lighting supports visibility. Presentation is reduced by text labels overlaid on the 3D model.

detected_errors.description: Doors/windows/openings are simplified; window placement and opening proportions cannot be fully confirmed against the 2D plan.
Minor layout/identity inconsistencies (e.g., bedroom labeling differs from the 2D plan), though the underlying room geometry largely matches.
Text labels are present in the 3D render, reducing presentation cleanliness.

summary: A true cutaway 3D conversion with strong layout fidelity and interior detailing, with only minor opening/label and presentation issues.
